mapper.select: SELECT s.name studentName ,class.`name` studentClass ,college.`name` college ,c.score score ,p.`name` projectName FROM tb_competition c JOIN tb_athlete a ON c.type_id = a.athlete_id JOIN tb_student s ON a.student_id = s.student_id JOIN tb_class class ON s.class_id = class.class_id JOIN tb_college college ON s.college_id = college.college_id JOIN tb_arrangement arrangement ON c.arrangement_id = arrangement.arrangement_id JOIN tb_project p ON arrangement.project_id = p.project_id WHERE c.is_effective = 1 and c.type = #{type} AND p.`name` = #{projectName}
